New Records: Kyle Lowry moved past Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Famer Tony Parker on the NBA’s all-time assists list and has 7,038 for his career.
Key Match Events: Jared McCain recorded a career-high 27 points
Guerschon Yabusele recorded a career-high 20 points
Caleb Martin recorded the sixth four-steal game of his NBA career
Pre-Game Insights: The 2024-25 Knicks boast the second-rated offense in the NBA (119.5 points per 100 possessions) through their first nine games.
Philadelphia leads the all-time regular season series 265-208 overall and 149-71 at home.
The Sixers play each of the other four teams in their group once - two home and two away.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Emirates NBA Cup 2024, the NBA’s second annual in-season competition, divides all 30 teams into six groups (three in each conference)
The Sixers play on their new blue court for Philadelphia 76ers Cup Nights presented by Chick-fil-A.
Jared McCain on guarding LaMelo Ball in overtime…
The game is a 7:30 p.m. ET start in Philadelphia.
Others: Joel Embiid was not listed on the injury report entering gameday morning.
Tyrese Maxey (right hamstring strain) remains out for the Sixers.
Precious Achiuwa (left hamstring strain) and Mitchell Robinson (left ankle surgery) are out for the Knicks.
Miles McBride (left knee inflammation) and Cameron Payne (left hamstring strain) are questionable.
